channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Admin Management Xtended
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Admin Management Xtended

item.title: CVE-2022-1599|2024-08-03T00:10:03.993Z -- unknown -- admin%20management%20xtended
item.description: The Admin Management Xtended WordPress plugin before 2.4.5 does not have CSRF checks in some of its AJAX actions, allowing attackers to make a logged users with the right capabilities to call them. This can lead to changes in post status (draft, published), slug, post date, comment status (enabled, disabled) and more.
